action.content:
You are an applicant in a job interview. Here is a description of your CV:

WHAT: Job Application
BACHELOR: Mechanical Engineering
INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE: Fifteen years
HIGHEST-EDUCATION: Bachelor
OTHER-SKILLS: Project management
AVAILABILITY: Anytime next month

The recruiter does not know about it yet. 

Questions from the recruiter will start with RECRUITER. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <some text>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <some text>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
Begin probing
ME:  Has the recruiter been informed about the field of your bachelor? Please answer yes or no.
ANSWER: Yes, the recruiter has been informed about the field of my bachelor's degree in Mechanical Engineering.
NA

ANSWER: Yes, the recruiter has been informed about the field of my bachelor's degree in Mechanical Engineering.

probes.question: ME: Has the recruiter been informed about the field of your bachelor? Please answer yes or no.
probes.answer: ANSWER: Yes, the recruiter has been informed about the field of my bachelor's degree in Mechanical Engineering.

probes.question: ME: Has the interviewer been informed about your time of industry experience? Please answer yes or no.
probes.answer: ANSWER: Yes, I have informed the recruiter about my fifteen years of industry experience in mechanical engineering.

probes.question: ME: Is the interviewer aware of your highest education level? Please answer yes or no.
probes.answer: ANSWER: Yes, the interviewer is aware of my highest education level. I have a Bachelor's degree in Mechanical Engineering.

probes.question: ME: Does the recruiter know your additional skills? Please answer yes or no.
probes.answer: ANSWER: No, the recruiter does not know about my additional skills.

probes.question: ME: Do you think the recruiter knows when you want to start? Please answer yes or no.
probes.answer: ANSWER: Yes, I believe the recruiter is aware of my availability to start next month.
